entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , East Point
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:42 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: East Point 07:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023
Temperature: -7.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -9.8°C
Wind: WSW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. High plus 1. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then north 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023
